interactions.subject: Project Kickoff Discussion
interactions.content: Thank you for choosing our CRM solution. Let's schedule a kickoff meeting to discuss the implementation timeline.

interactions.subject: Initial Consultation
interactions.content: 30-minute call to understand business requirements and current tech stack.

interactions.subject: Creative Brief Review
interactions.content: In-person meeting to review the creative brief and discuss campaign objectives.

interactions.subject: Follow-up on Demo
interactions.content: Following up on yesterday's product demonstration. Do you have any questions about the inventory features?

interactions.subject: Implementation Progress
interactions.content: Weekly progress call to discuss implementation milestones and address any concerns.
